thread.title: Target Portrait Studios Announces New Studio Experience, Photography, Online Shop And Pricing: Fast. Fun. Easy. Done!
thread.title_full: Target Portrait Studios Announces New Studio Experience, Photography, Online Shop And Pricing: Fast. Fun. Easy. Done!

author: admin
title: Target Portrait Studios Announces New Studio Experience, Photography, Online Shop And Pricing: Fast. Fun. Easy. Done!
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Target Portrait Studios 
MINNEAPOLIS, Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Target Portrait Studios has launched a new way to capture memories. The changes at Target Portrait Studios include a new, no-hassle experience designed for busy moms. In just 30 minutes or less, families can visit a Target Portrait Studio, plan a photography session, have pictures taken (featuring new backgrounds and candid, natural poses) and after reviewing the images pay just $49.99 for the entire experience (price available through the month of October, regularly priced $74.99). The experience includes ALL high and low resolution images, emailed and available for download shortly after the session. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150929/272019LOGO 
Additionally, a new Target Portrait Studios Online Shop showcases the images, perfect for sharing, and offers competitive prices for prints, home decor and gifts, all accessible via phone, tablet or desktop. Target Portrait Studios customers can also upload personal photography to the Online Shop and create customized products, such as Christmas cards and gifts, featuring professional studio photography and recent vacation photos. 
From capturing the first family picture to continuing a holiday tradition, Target Portrait Studios gives customers the ability to make photography fun again. 
Visit targetportraits.com for locations and to make an appointment (same day appointments available). Fast. Fun. Easy. Done! Contacts: Stephanie Schmid Christine Schraml sschmid@lifetouch.com cschraml@lifetouch.com 952-826-5952 952-826-4038 
About Target Portrait Studios Located in approximately 145 Target Stores, Target Portrait Studios photographs newborns, toddlers, siblings and entire families. Whether celebrating a special occasion or just wanting to catch an everyday moment, Target Portrait Studios can make it convenient and fun. Owned and operated by Lifetouch Portrait Studios Inc., Target Portrait Studios Capture Memories for a Lifetime(Â®). 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/target-portrait-studios-announces-new-studio-experience-photography-online-shop-and-pricing-fast-fun-easy-done-300150992.html 
SOURCE Target Portrait Studios
